scripts.test: npm run settings && npm run test-default && npm run test-full && npm run test-empty && npm run test-output && node test/test.js
scripts.build: npm run settings && rm -rf dist/**/* && npm run build-dist
scripts.build-dist: npm run build-default && npm run build-full
scripts.build-default: node-sass dist-input/default.scss dist/piet.css --output-style nested && node-sass dist-input/default.scss dist/piet.min.css  --output-style compressed
scripts.build-full: node-sass dist-input/full.scss dist/piet.full.css nested --output-style && node-sass dist-input/full.scss dist/piet.full.min.css  --output-style compressed
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
